title.text: RFC 6216: Example Call Flows Using Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Security Mechanisms

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                       C. Jennings
Request for Comments: 6216                                 Cisco Systems
Category: Informational                                           K. Ono
ISSN: 2070-1721                                      Columbia University
                                                               R. Sparks
                                                         B. Hibbard, Ed.
                                                                 Tekelec
                                                              April 2011
Example Call Flows Using Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Security Mechanisms
contents.zh-CHS: 使用会话启动协议（SIP）安全机制的示例呼叫流

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document shows example call flows demonstrating the use of Transport Layer Security (TLS), and Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (S/MIME) in Session Initiation Protocol (SIP). It also provides information that helps implementers build interoperable SIP software. To help facilitate interoperability testing, it includes certificates used in the example call flows and processes to create certificates for testing.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档展示了示例调用流，演示了在会话启动协议（SIP）中使用传输层安全性（TLS）和安全/多用途Internet邮件扩展（S/MIME）。它还提供了帮助实施者构建可互操作SIP软件的信息。为了帮助促进互操作性测试，它包括示例调用流中使用的证书和创建测试证书的过程。

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document is informational and is not normative on any aspect of SIP.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件仅供参考，在SIP的任何方面均不规范。

contents.text: SIP with TLS ([RFC5246]) implementations are becoming very common. Several implementations of the S/MIME ([RFC5751]) portion of SIP ([RFC3261]) are also becoming available. After several interoperability events, it is clear that it is difficult to write these systems without any test vectors or examples of "known good" messages to test against. Furthermore, testing at the events is often hindered due to the lack of a commonly trusted certification authority to sign the certificates used in the events. This document addresses both of these issues by providing messages that give detailed examples that implementers can use for comparison and that can also be used for testing. In addition, this document provides a common certificate and private key that can be used to set up a mock Certification Authority (CA) that can be used during the SIP interoperability events. Certificate requests from the users will be signed by the private key of the mock CA. The document also provides some hints and clarifications for implementers.
contents.zh-CHS: 带有TLS（[RFC5246]）实现的SIP变得非常普遍。SIP（[RFC3261]）的S/MIME（[RFC5751]）部分的几种实现也开始可用。在几次互操作性事件之后，很明显，如果没有任何测试向量或“已知良好”消息的示例进行测试，就很难编写这些系统。此外，由于缺乏共同信任的证书颁发机构来签署事件中使用的证书，因此在事件中进行测试通常会受到阻碍。本文档通过提供消息来解决这两个问题，这些消息给出了实现人员可用于比较的详细示例，也可用于测试。此外，本文档还提供了一个公共证书和私钥，可用于设置模拟证书颁发机构（CA），该机构可在SIP互操作性事件期间使用。来自用户的证书请求将由模拟CA的私钥签名。该文档还为实现者提供了一些提示和说明。

contents.text: A simple SIP call flow using SIPS URIs and TLS is shown in Section 3. The certificates for the hosts used are shown in Section 2.2, and the CA certificates used to sign these are shown in Section 2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用SIPS URI和TLS的简单SIP调用流如第3节所示。所用主机的证书见第2.2节，用于签署这些证书的CA证书见第2.1节。

contents.text: The text from Section 4.1 through Section 4.3 shows some simple SIP call flows using S/MIME to sign and encrypt the body of the message. The user certificates used in these examples are shown in Section 2.3. These host certificates are signed with the same mock CA private key.
contents.zh-CHS: 从第4.1节到第4.3节的文本显示了一些使用S/MIME对消息体进行签名和加密的简单SIP调用流。这些示例中使用的用户证书如第2.3节所示。这些主机证书使用相同的模拟CA私钥进行签名。

contents.text: Section 5 presents a partial list of items that implementers should consider in order to implement systems that will interoperate.
contents.zh-CHS: 第5节介绍了实现系统将要考虑的部分项目列表，以便实现互操作的系统。

contents.text: Scripts and instructions to make certificates that can be used for interoperability testing are presented in Appendix A, along with methods for converting these to various formats. The certificates used while creating the examples and test messages in this document are made available in Appendix B.
contents.zh-CHS: 可用于互操作性测试的证书制作脚本和说明见附录A，以及将其转换为各种格式的方法。附录B提供了在本文件中创建示例和测试消息时使用的证书。

contents.text: Binary copies of various messages in this document that can be used for testing appear in Appendix C.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中可用于测试的各种信息的二进制副本见附录C。

contents.text: 2. Certificates
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 证书

contents.text: 2.1. CA Certificates
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. CA证书

contents.text: The certificate used by the CA to sign the other certificates is shown below. This is an X.509v3 ([X.509]) certificate. Note that the X.509v3 Basic Constraints in the certificate allows it to be used as a CA, certification authority. This certificate is not used directly in the TLS call flow; it is used only to verify user and host certificates.
contents.zh-CHS: CA用于签署其他证书的证书如下所示。这是一个X.509v3（[X.509]）证书。请注意，证书中的X.509v3基本约束允许将其用作CA、证书颁发机构。此证书不直接用于TLS调用流；它仅用于验证用户和主机证书。

The certificate content shown above and throughout this document was rendered by the OpenSSL "x509" tool. These dumps are included only as informative examples. Output may vary among future revisions of the tool. At the time of this document's publication, there were some irregularities in the presentation of Distinguished Names (DNs). In particular, note that in the "Issuer" and "Subject" fields, it appears the intent is to present DNs in Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) format. If this was intended, the spaces should have been omitted after the delimiting commas, and the elements should have been presented in order of most-specific to least-specific. Please refer to Appendix A of [RFC4514]. Using the "Issuer" DN from above as an example and following guidelines in [RFC4514], it should have instead appeared as:
contents.zh-CHS: 上面和整个文档中显示的证书内容是由OpenSSL“x509”工具提供的。这些转储仅作为信息示例包含。输出可能因工具的未来版本而异。在本文件发布时，可分辨名称（DNs）的表示存在一些不规则之处。特别要注意的是，在“颁发者”和“主题”字段中，其目的似乎是以轻量级目录访问协议（LDAP）格式显示DNs。如果这是有意的，则应在分隔逗号后省略空格，并且元素应按最具体到最不具体的顺序显示。请参考[RFC4514]的附录A。以上面的“发行人”DN为例，并遵循[RFC4514]中的指导原则，它应该显示为：

2.2. Host Certificates
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 主机证书

contents.text: The certificate for the host example.com is shown below. Note that the Subject Alternative Name is set to example.com and is a DNS type. The certificates for the other hosts are shown in Appendix B.

contents.text: The example host certificate above, as well as all the others presented in this document, are signed directly by a root CA. These certificate chains have a length equal to two: the root CA and the host certificate. Non-root CAs exist and may also sign certificates. The certificate chains presented by hosts with certificates signed by
contents.zh-CHS: 上面的示例主机证书以及本文档中提供的所有其他证书都由根CA直接签名。这些证书链的长度等于两个：根CA和主机证书。存在非根CA，也可以签署证书。主机提供的证书链，证书由

contents.text: non-root CAs will have a length greater than two. For more details on how certificate chains are validated, see Sections 6.1 and 6.2 of [RFC5280].

contents.text: 2.3. User Certificates
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. 用户证书

contents.text: User certificates are used by many applications to establish user identity. The user certificate for fluffy@example.com is shown below. Note that the Subject Alternative Name has a list of names with different URL types such as a sip, im, or pres URL. This is necessary for interoperating with a Common Profile for Instant Messaging (CPIM) gateway. In this example, example.com is the domain for fluffy. The message could be coming from any host in *.example.com, and the address-of-record (AOR) in the user certificate would still be the same. The others are shown in Appendix B.1. These certificates make use of the Extended Key Usage (EKU) extension discussed in [RFC5924]. Note that the X509v3 Extended Key Usage attribute refers to the SIP OID introduced in [RFC5924], which is 1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.20.
contents.zh-CHS: 许多应用程序使用用户证书来建立用户身份。的用户证书fluffy@example.com如下所示。请注意，主题备选名称有一个具有不同URL类型（如sip、im或pres URL）的名称列表。这对于与即时消息（CPIM）网关的公共配置文件进行互操作是必需的。在本例中，example.com是fluffy的域。消息可能来自*.example.com中的任何主机，并且用户证书中的记录地址（AOR）仍然相同。其他如附录B.1所示。这些证书使用[RFC5924]中讨论的扩展密钥使用（EKU）扩展。请注意，X509v3扩展密钥使用属性是指[RFC5924]中引入的SIP OID，即1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.20。

contents.text: 3. Call Flow with Message Over TLS
contents.zh-CHS: 3. TLS上带有消息的调用流

contents.text: 3.1. TLS with Server Authentication
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. 具有服务器身份验证的TLS

contents.text: The flow below shows the edited SSLDump output of the host example.com forming a TLS [RFC5246] connection to example.net. In this example, mutual authentication is not used. Note that the client proposed three protocol suites including TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA defined in [RFC5246]. The certificate returned by the server contains a Subject Alternative Name that is set to example.net. A detailed discussion of TLS can be found in SSL and TLS [EKR-TLS]. For more details on the SSLDump tool, see the SSLDump Manual [ssldump-manpage].
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的流程显示了主机example.com编辑后的SSLDump输出，该主机example.com与example.net形成TLS[RFC5246]连接。在此示例中，不使用相互身份验证。注意，客户提出了三个协议套件，包括TLS_RSA_和[RFC5246]中定义的_AES_128_CBC_SHA。服务器返回的证书包含设置为example.net的使用者替代名称。有关TLS的详细讨论，请参见SSL和TLS[EKR-TLS]。有关SSLDump工具的更多详细信息，请参阅SSLDump手册[SSLDump手册页]。

contents.text: This example does not use the Server Extended Hello (see [RFC5246]).
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例不使用服务器扩展Hello（请参阅[RFC5246]）。

3.2. MESSAGE Transaction Over TLS
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. TLS上的消息事务

contents.text: Once the TLS session is set up, the following MESSAGE request (as defined in [RFC3428] is sent from fluffy@example.com to kumiko@example.net. Note that the URI has a SIPS URL and that the VIA indicates that TLS was used. In order to format this document, the <allOneLine> convention from [RFC4475] is used to break long lines. The actual message does not contain the line breaks contained within those tags.
contents.zh-CHS: 设置TLS会话后，将从发送以下消息请求（定义见[RFC3428]）fluffy@example.com到kumiko@example.net.请注意，URI有一个SIPS URL，并且VIA表示使用了TLS。为了格式化此文档，请使用[RFC4475]中的<allOneLine>约定用于打断长行。实际消息不包含这些标记中包含的换行符。

contents.text:
MESSAGE sips:kumiko@example.net:5061 SIP/2.0
<allOneLine>
Via: SIP/2.0/TLS 192.0.2.2:15001;
     branch=z9hG4bK-d8754z-c785a077a9a8451b-1---d8754z-;
     rport=50738
</allOneLine>
Max-Forwards: 70
To: <sips:kumiko@example.net:5061>
From: <sips:fluffy@example.com:15001>;tag=1a93430b
Call-ID: OTZmMDE2OWNlYTVjNDkzYzBhMWRlMDU4NDExZmU4ZTQ.
CSeq: 4308 MESSAGE
<allOneLine>
Accept: multipart/signed, text/plain, application/pkcs7-mime,
        application/sdp, multipart/alternative
</allOneLine>
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Length: 6
Hello!
contents.zh-CHS: 你好

contents.text: When a User Agent (UA) goes to send a message to example.com, the UA can see if it already has a TLS connection to example.com and if it does, it may send the message over this connection. A UA should have some scheme for reusing connections as opening a new TLS connection for every message results in awful performance. Implementers are encouraged to read [RFC5923] and [RFC3263].
contents.zh-CHS: 当用户代理（UA）向example.com发送消息时，UA可以查看是否已经与example.com建立了TLS连接，如果已经建立了TLS连接，则可以通过该连接发送消息。UA应该有一些重用连接的方案，因为为每条消息打开新的TLS连接会导致糟糕的性能。鼓励实施者阅读[RFC5923]和[RFC3263]。

contents.text: The response is sent from example.net to example.com over the same TLS connection. It is shown below.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应通过相同的TLS连接从example.net发送到example.com。如下所示。

contents.text:
SIP/2.0 200 OK
<allOneLine>
Via: SIP/2.0/TLS 192.0.2.2:15001;
     branch=z9hG4bK-d8754z-c785a077a9a8451b-1---d8754z-;
     rport=50738
</allOneLine>
To: <sips:kumiko@example.net:5061>;tag=0d075510
From: <sips:fluffy@example.com:15001>;tag=1a93430b
Call-ID: OTZmMDE2OWNlYTVjNDkzYzBhMWRlMDU4NDExZmU4ZTQ.
CSeq: 4308 MESSAGE
Content-Length: 0
4. Call Flow with S/MIME-Secured Message
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 具有S/MIME安全消息的调用流

contents.text: 4.1. MESSAGE Request with Signed Body
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 具有签名正文的消息请求

contents.text: Below is an example of a signed message. The values on the Content-Type line (multipart/signed) and on the Content-Disposition line have been broken across lines to fit on the page, but they are not broken across lines in actual implementations.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面是一个签名消息的示例。内容类型行（multipart/signed）和内容处置行上的值已跨行断开以适合页面，但在实际实现中它们不会跨行断开。

contents.text:
MESSAGE sip:kumiko@example.net SIP/2.0
<allOneLine>
Via: SIP/2.0/TCP 192.0.2.2:15001;
     branch=z9hG4bK-d8754z-3a922b6dc0f0ff37-1---d8754z-;
     rport=50739
</allOneLine>
Max-Forwards: 70
To: <sip:kumiko@example.net>
From: <sip:fluffy@example.com>;tag=ef6bad5e
Call-ID: N2NiZjI0NjRjNDQ0MTY1NDRjNWNmMGU1MDA2MDRhYmI.
CSeq: 8473 MESSAGE
<allOneLine>
Accept: multipart/signed, text/plain, application/pkcs7-mime,
        application/sdp, multipart/alternative
</allOneLine>
<allOneLine>
Content-Type: multipart/signed;boundary=3b515e121b43a911;
              micalg=sha1;protocol="application/pkcs7-signature"
</allOneLine>
Content-Length: 774

--3b515e121b43a911
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

Hello!
--3b515e121b43a911
Content-Type: application/pkcs7-signature;name=smime.p7s
<allOneLine>
Content-Disposition: attachment;handling=required;
                     filename=smime.p7s
</allOneLine>
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

It is important to note that the signature ("BINARY BLOB 1") is computed over the MIME headers and body, but excludes the multipart boundary lines. The value on the Message-body line ends with CRLF. The CRLF is included in the boundary and is not part of the signature computation. To be clear, the signature is computed over data starting with the "C" in the "Content-Type" and ending with the "!" in the "Hello!".
contents.zh-CHS: 需要注意的是，签名（“二进制BLOB 1”）是在MIME头和主体上计算的，但不包括多部分边界线。消息正文行上的值以CRLF结尾。CRLF包含在边界中，不属于签名计算的一部分。需要说明的是，签名是在“内容类型”中以“C”开头，在“Hello！”中以“！”结尾的数据上计算的。

contents.text:
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary
Hello!
contents.zh-CHS: 你好

contents.text: Following is the ASN.1 parsing of encrypted contents referred to above as "BINARY BLOB 1". Note that at address 30, the hash for the signature is specified as SHA-1. Also note that the sender's certificate is not attached as it is optional in [RFC5652].
contents.zh-CHS: 下面是ASN.1对加密内容的解析，上面称为“二进制Blob1”。注意，在地址30处，签名的散列被指定为SHA-1。还要注意的是，发送方证书未随附，因为它在[RFC5652]中是可选的。

contents.text: SHA-1 parameters may be omitted entirely, instead of being set to NULL, as mentioned in [RFC3370]. The above dump of Blob 1 has SHA-1 parameters set to NULL. Below are the same contents signed with the same key, but omitting the NULL according to [RFC3370]. This is the preferred encoding. This is covered in greater detail in Section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: SHA-1参数可以完全省略，而不是设置为NULL，如[RFC3370]中所述。Blob 1的上述转储将SHA-1参数设置为NULL。以下是使用相同密钥签名的相同内容，但根据[RFC3370]省略了NULL。这是首选编码。第5节对此进行了更详细的介绍。

contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 具有加密正文的消息请求

contents.text: Below is an example of an encrypted text/plain message that says "Hello!". The binary encrypted contents have been replaced with the block "BINARY BLOB 2".
contents.zh-CHS: 下面是一个加密文本/普通消息的示例，该消息表示“Hello！”。二进制加密内容已替换为块“binary BLOB 2”。

Via: SIP/2.0/TCP 192.0.2.2:15001;

</allOneLine>
Max-Forwards: 70

Following is the ASN.1 parsing of "BINARY BLOB 2". Note that at address 454, the encryption is set to aes128-CBC.

contents.zh-CHS: 4.3. 具有加密和签名正文的消息请求

contents.text: In the example below, some of the header values have been split across multiple lines. Where the lines have been broken, the <allOneLine> convention has been used. This was only done to make it fit in the RFC format. Specifically, the application/pkcs7-mime Content-Type line is one line with no whitespace between the "mime;" and the "smime-type". The values are split across lines for formatting, but are not split in the real message. The binary
contents.zh-CHS: 在下面的示例中，一些标题值已跨多行拆分。如果线已断开，则使用<allOneLine>约定。这样做只是为了使其适合RFC格式。具体来说，application/pkcs7 mime内容类型行是一行，在“mime；”和“smime类型”之间没有空格。这些值会跨行拆分以进行格式化，但不会在实际消息中拆分。二进制

contents.text: encrypted content has been replaced with "BINARY BLOB 3", and the binary signed content has been replaced with "BINARY BLOB 4".
contents.zh-CHS: 加密内容已替换为“二进制BLOB 3”，二进制签名内容已替换为“二进制BLOB 4”。

</allOneLine>
Max-Forwards: 70

CSeq: 5449 MESSAGE
<allOneLine>

        application/sdp, multipart/alternative
</allOneLine>
<allOneLine>
Content-Type: multipart/signed;boundary=e8df6e1ce5d1e864;
              micalg=sha1;protocol="application/pkcs7-signature"
</allOneLine>
Content-Length: 1455

--e8df6e1ce5d1e864
<allOneLine>

              name=smime.p7m
</allOneLine>

                     filename=smime.p7
</allOneLine>

*****************
* BINARY BLOB 3 *
*****************
--e8df6e1ce5d1e864
Content-Type: application/pkcs7-signature;name=smime.p7s

Below is the ASN.1 parsing of "BINARY BLOB 3".

contents.text: 5. Observed Interoperability Issues
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 观察到的互操作性问题

contents.text: This section describes some common interoperability problems. These were observed by the authors at SIPit interoperability events. Implementers should be careful to verify that their systems do not introduce these common problems, and, when possible, make their
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍一些常见的互操作性问题。这些是作者在SIPit互操作性活动中观察到的。实现者应该小心地验证他们的系统没有引入这些常见问题，并且在可能的情况下，使其

contents.text: clients forgiving in what they receive. Implementations should take extra care to produce reasonable error messages when interacting with software that has these problems.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户会原谅他们所收到的。在与存在这些问题的软件交互时，实现应该特别注意生成合理的错误消息。

contents.text: Some SIP clients incorrectly only do SSLv3 and do not support TLS. See Section 26.2.1 of [RFC3261].
contents.zh-CHS: 一些SIP客户端错误地只执行SSLv3，不支持TLS。参见[RFC3261]第26.2.1节。

contents.text: Many SIP clients were found to accept expired certificates with no warning or error. See Section 4.1.2.5 of [RFC5280].
contents.zh-CHS: 发现许多SIP客户端接受过期证书时没有任何警告或错误。见[RFC5280]第4.1.2.5节。

contents.text: When used with SIP, TLS and S/MIME provide the identity of the peer that a client is communicating with in the Subject Alternative Name in the certificate. The software checks that this name corresponds to the identity the server is trying to contact. Normative text describing path validation can be found in Section 7 of [RFC5922] and Section 6 of [RFC5280]. If a client is trying to set up a TLS connection to good.example.com and it gets a TLS connection set up with a server that presents a valid certificate but with the name evil.example.com, it will typically generate an error or warning of some type. Similarly with S/MIME, if a user is trying to communicate with sip:fluffy@example.com, one of the items in the Subject Alternate Name set in the certificate will need to match according to the certificate validation rules in Section 23 of [RFC3261] and Section 6 of [RFC5280].
contents.zh-CHS: 与SIP一起使用时，TLS和S/MIME以证书中的使用者替代名称提供客户端正在与之通信的对等方的标识。软件将检查此名称是否与服务器试图联系的身份相对应。描述路径验证的规范性文本可在[RFC5922]第7节和[RFC5280]第6节中找到。如果客户端试图设置到good.example.com的TLS连接，并且它与提供有效证书但名称为evil.example.com的服务器建立了TLS连接，则它通常会生成某种类型的错误或警告。与S/MIME类似，如果用户尝试与sip通信：fluffy@example.com，根据[RFC3261]第23节和[RFC5280]第6节中的证书验证规则，证书中设置的受试者备选名称中的一项需要匹配。

contents.text: Some implementations used binary MIME encodings while others used base64. It is advisable that implementations send only binary and are prepared to receive either. See Section 3.2 of [RFC5621].
contents.zh-CHS: 一些实现使用二进制MIME编码，而其他实现使用base64。建议实现只发送二进制文件，并准备接收其中任何一个。见[RFC5621]第3.2节。

contents.text: In several places in this document, the messages contain the encoding for the SHA-1 digest algorithm identifier. The preferred form for encoding as set out in Section 2 of [RFC3370] is the form in which the optional AlgorithmIdentifier parameter field is omitted. However, [RFC3370] also says the recipients need to be able to receive the form in which the AlgorithmIdentifier parameter field is present and set to NULL. Examples of the form using NULL can be found in Section 4.2 of [RFC4134]. Receivers really do need to be able to receive the form that includes the NULL because the NULL form, while not preferred, is what was observed as being generated by most implementations. Implementers should also note that if the algorithm is MD5 instead of SHA-1, then the form that omits the AlgorithmIdentifier parameters field is not allowed and the sender has to use the form where the NULL is included.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文档的几个地方，消息包含SHA-1摘要算法标识符的编码。[RFC3370]第2节规定的首选编码形式是省略可选算法标识符参数字段的形式。但是，[RFC3370]还表示，接收者需要能够接收存在AlgorithmIdentifier参数字段并设置为NULL的表单。使用NULL的表格示例见[RFC4134]第4.2节。接收者确实需要能够接收包含空值的表单，因为空值表单虽然不是首选的表单，但大多数实现都会生成空值表单。实现者还应注意，如果算法是MD5而不是SHA-1，则不允许省略AlgorithmIdentifier参数字段的表单，发送者必须使用包含NULL的表单。

contents.text: The preferred encryption algorithm for S/MIME in SIP is AES as defined in [RFC3853].
contents.zh-CHS: SIP中S/MIME的首选加密算法是[RFC3853]中定义的AES。

contents.text: Observed S/MIME interoperability has been better when UAs did not attach the senders' certificates. Attaching the certificates significantly increases the size of the messages, which should be considered when sending over UDP. Furthermore, the receiver cannot rely on the sender to always send the certificate, so it does not turn out to be useful in most situations.
contents.zh-CHS: 当UAs没有附加发送者的证书时，观察到的S/MIME互操作性更好。附加证书会显著增加消息的大小，在通过UDP发送时应考虑这一点。此外，接收方不能依赖发送方始终发送证书，因此它在大多数情况下都没有用处。

contents.text: Please note that the certificate path validation algorithm described in Section 6 of [RFC5280] is a complex algorithm for which all of the details matter. There are numerous ways in which failing to precisely implement the algorithm as specified in Section 6 of [RFC5280] can create a security flaw, a simple example of which is the failure to check the expiration date that is already mentioned above. It is important for developers to ensure that this validation is performed and that the results are verified by their applications or any libraries that they use.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，[RFC5280]第6节中描述的证书路径验证算法是一个复杂的算法，所有细节都很重要。有很多种方式，如果未能按照[RFC5280]第6节的规定准确实施算法，可能会产生安全漏洞，其中一个简单的例子就是未能检查上述过期日期。开发人员必须确保执行此验证，并确保其应用程序或使用的任何库验证结果。

contents.text: 6. Additional Test Scenarios
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 其他测试场景

contents.text: This section provides a non-exhaustive list of tests that implementations should perform while developing systems that use S/MIME and TLS for SIP.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节提供了在开发使用S/MIME和TLS for SIP的系统时实现应执行的测试的非详尽列表。

contents.text: Much of the required behavior for inspecting certificates when using S/MIME and TLS with SIP is currently underspecified. The non-normative recommendations in this document capture the current folklore around that required behavior, guided by both related normative works such as [RFC4474] (particularly, Section 13.4 Domain Names and Subordination) and informative works such as [RFC2818], Section 3.1. To summarize, test plans should:
contents.zh-CHS: 在将S/MIME和TLS与SIP一起使用时，检查证书所需的许多行为目前还没有明确规定。本文件中的非规范性建议以相关规范性著作（如[RFC4474]（特别是第13.4节域名和从属关系）和信息性著作（如[RFC2818]第3.1节）为指导，捕捉了当前关于所需行为的民间传说。总之，测试计划应：

contents.text: o For S/MIME secured bodies, ensure that the peer's URI (address-of-record, as per [RFC3261], Section 23.3) appears in the subjectAltName of the peer's certificate as a uniformResourceIdentifier field.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于S/MIME安全实体，确保对等方的URI（记录地址，根据[RFC3261]第23.3节）作为uniformResourceIdentifier字段出现在对等方证书的subjectAltName中。

contents.text: o For TLS, ensure that the peer's hostname appears as described in [RFC5922]. Also:
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于TLS，请确保对等机的主机名显示如[RFC5922]中所述。也：

contents.text: * ensure an exact match in a dNSName entry in the subjectAltName if there are any dNSNames in the subjectAltName. Wildcard matching is not allowed against these dNSName entries. See Section 7.1 of [RFC5922].
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果subjectAltName中存在任何dNSName，请确保subjectAltName中的dNSName条目完全匹配。不允许对这些dNSName条目进行通配符匹配。见[RFC5922]第7.1节。

contents.text: * ensure that the most specific CommonName in the Subject field matches if there are no dNSName entries in the subjectAltName at all (which is not the same as there being no matching
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果subjectAltName中根本没有dNSName条目，请确保Subject字段中最特定的CommonName匹配（这与没有匹配不同）

contents.text: dNSName entries). This match can be either exact, or against an entry that uses the wildcard matching character '*'.
contents.zh-CHS: dNSName条目）。此匹配可以是精确匹配，也可以是针对使用通配符匹配字符“*”的条目的匹配。

contents.text: The peer's hostname is discovered from the initial DNS query in the server location process [RFC3263].
contents.zh-CHS: 对等方的主机名是从服务器位置进程[RFC3263]中的初始DNS查询中发现的。

contents.text: o IP addresses can appear in subjectAltName ([RFC5280]) of the peer's certificate, e.g., "IP:192.168.0.1". Note that if IP addresses are used in subjectAltName, there are important ramifications regarding the use of Record-Route headers that also need to be considered. See Section 7.5 of [RFC5922]. Use of IP addresses instead of domain names is inadvisable.
contents.zh-CHS: o IP地址可以出现在对等方证书的subjectAltName（[RFC5280]）中，例如“IP:192.168.0.1”。请注意，如果在subjectAltName中使用IP地址，则还需要考虑有关记录路由头的使用的一些重要影响。见[RFC5922]第7.5节。使用IP地址代替域名是不可取的。

contents.text: For each of these tests, an implementation will proceed past the verification point only if the certificate is "good". S/MIME protected requests presenting bad certificate data will be rejected. S/MIME protected responses presenting bad certificate information will be ignored. TLS connections involving bad certificate data will not be completed.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于这些测试中的每一个，只有在证书“良好”的情况下，实现才会通过验证点。将拒绝提供错误证书数据的受S/MIME保护的请求。将忽略提供错误证书信息的受S/MIME保护的响应。涉及错误证书数据的TLS连接将无法完成。

contents.text: 1. S/MIME : Good peer certificate
contents.zh-CHS: 1. S/MIME：良好的对等证书

contents.text: 2. S/MIME : Bad peer certificate (peer URI does not appear in subjectAltName)
contents.zh-CHS: 2. S/MIME:错误的对等证书（对等URI未出现在subjectAltName中）

contents.text: 3. S/MIME : Bad peer certificate (valid authority chain does not end at a trusted CA)
contents.zh-CHS: 3. S/MIME:错误的对等证书（有效的权限链不以受信任的CA结尾）

contents.text: 4. S/MIME : Bad peer certificate (incomplete authority chain)
contents.zh-CHS: 4. S/MIME:错误的对等证书（不完整的权限链）

contents.text: 5. S/MIME : Bad peer certificate (the current time does not fall within the period of validity)
contents.zh-CHS: 5. S/MIME:错误的对等证书（当前时间不在有效期内）

contents.text: 6. S/MIME : Bad peer certificate (certificate, or certificate in authority chain, has been revoked)
contents.zh-CHS: 6. S/MIME:错误的对等证书（证书或权限链中的证书已被吊销）

contents.text: 7. S/MIME : Bad peer certificate ("Digital Signature" is not specified as an X509v3 Key Usage)
contents.zh-CHS: 7. S/MIME:错误的对等证书（“数字签名”未指定为X509v3密钥用法）

contents.text: 8. TLS : Good peer certificate (hostname appears in dNSName in subjectAltName)
contents.zh-CHS: 8. TLS:Good peer certificate（主机名出现在subjectAltName中的dNSName中）

contents.text: 9. TLS : Good peer certificate (no dNSNames in subjectAltName, hostname appears in Common Name (CN) of Subject)
contents.zh-CHS: 9. TLS：良好的对等证书（subjectAltName中没有dnsname，主机名出现在Subject的公用名（CN）中）

contents.text: 10. TLS : Good peer certificate (CN of Subject empty, and subjectAltName extension contains an iPAddress stored in the octet string in network byte order form as specified in RFC 791 [RFC0791])
contents.zh-CHS: 10. TLS:Good peer certificate（Subject的CN为空，subjectAltName扩展名包含以RFC 791[RFC0791]中指定的网络字节顺序形式存储在八位字节字符串中的IP地址）

contents.text: 11. TLS : Bad peer certificate (no match in dNSNames or in the Subject CN)
contents.zh-CHS: 11. TLS:错误的对等证书（dNSNames或主题CN中不匹配）

contents.text: 12. TLS : Bad peer certificate (valid authority chain does not end at a trusted CA)
contents.zh-CHS: 12. TLS:错误的对等证书（有效的权限链不以受信任的CA结尾）

contents.text: 13. TLS : Bad peer certificate (incomplete authority chain)
contents.zh-CHS: 13. TLS:错误的对等证书（不完整的权限链）

contents.text: 14. TLS : Bad peer certificate (the current time does not fall within the period of validity)
contents.zh-CHS: 14. TLS:错误的对等证书（当前时间不在有效期内）

contents.text: 15. TLS : Bad peer certificate (certificate, or certificate in authority chain, has been revoked)
contents.zh-CHS: 15. TLS:错误的对等证书（证书或权限链中的证书已被吊销）

contents.text: 16. TLS : Bad peer certificate ("TLS Web Server Authentication" is not specified as an X509v3 Key Usage)
contents.zh-CHS: 16. TLS:错误的对等证书（“TLS Web服务器身份验证”未指定为X509v3密钥用法）

contents.text: 17. TLS : Bad peer certificate (Neither "SIP Domain" nor "Any Extended Key Usage" specified as an X509v3 Extended Key Usage, and X509v3 Extended Key Usage is present)
contents.zh-CHS: 17. TLS:错误的对等证书（既没有指定为X509v3扩展密钥用法的“SIP域”也没有指定为X509v3扩展密钥用法，并且存在X509v3扩展密钥用法）

contents.text: 7. Acknowledgments
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 致谢

contents.text: Many thanks to the developers of all the open source software used to create these call flows. This includes the underlying crypto and TLS software used from openssl.org, the SIP stack from www.resiprocate.org, and the SIP for Instant Messaging and Presence Leveraging Extensions (SIMPLE) Instant Messaging and Presence Protocol (IMPP) agent from www.sipimp.org. The TLS flow dumps were done with SSLDump from http://www.rtfm.com/ssldump. The book "SSL and TLS" [EKR-TLS] was a huge help in developing the code for these flows. It's sad there is no second edition.
contents.zh-CHS: 非常感谢所有用于创建这些调用流的开源软件的开发人员。这包括openssl.org中使用的底层加密和TLS软件、www.resiprocate.org中的SIP堆栈以及www.sipimp.org中利用扩展（简单）即时消息和状态协议（IMPP）代理的即时消息和状态SIP。TLS流量转储是使用来自的SSLDump完成的http://www.rtfm.com/ssldump. 《SSL和TLS》[EKR-TLS]一书对开发这些流的代码有很大帮助。很遗憾没有第二版。

contents.text: Thanks to Jim Schaad, Russ Housley, Eric Rescorla, Dan Wing, Tat Chan, and Lyndsay Campbell, who all helped find and correct mistakes in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 感谢Jim Schaad、Russ Housley、Eric Rescorla、Dan Wing、Tat Chan和Lyndsay Campbell，他们都帮助发现并纠正了本文中的错误。

contents.text: Vijay Gurbani and Alan Jeffrey contributed much of the additional test scenario content.
contents.zh-CHS: Vijay Gurbani和Alan Jeffrey贡献了很多额外的测试场景内容。

contents.text: 8. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 安全考虑

contents.text: Implementers must never use any of the certificates provided in this document in anything but a test environment. Installing the CA root certificates used in this document as a trusted root in operational software would completely destroy the security of the system while giving the user the impression that the system was operating securely.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现者不得在测试环境之外的任何环境中使用本文档中提供的任何证书。将本文档中使用的CA根证书作为操作软件中的受信任根安装将完全破坏系统的安全性，同时给用户留下系统安全运行的印象。

contents.text: This document recommends some things that implementers might test or verify to improve the security of their implementations. It is impossible to make a comprehensive list of these, and this document only suggests some of the most common mistakes that have been seen at the SIPit interoperability events. Just because an implementation does everything this document recommends does not make it secure.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档推荐了一些实现人员可能测试或验证的内容，以提高其实现的安全性。不可能全面列出这些错误，本文件仅建议了SIPit互操作性活动中出现的一些最常见错误。仅仅因为实现完成了本文档所建议的一切，并不能保证它的安全性。

contents.text: This document does not show any messages to check certificate revocation status (see Sections 3.3 and 6.3 of [RFC5280]) as that is not part of the SIP call flow. The expectation is that revocation status is checked regularly to protect against the possibility of certificate compromise or repudiation. For more information on how certificate revocation status can be checked, see [RFC2560] (Online Certificate Status Protocol) and [RFC5055] (Server-Based Certificate Validation Protocol).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件未显示任何检查证书撤销状态的消息（见[RFC5280]第3.3节和第6.3节），因为这不是SIP呼叫流的一部分。我们期望定期检查吊销状态，以防止证书泄露或拒绝。有关如何检查证书吊销状态的更多信息，请参阅[RFC2560]（联机证书状态协议）和[RFC5055]（基于服务器的证书验证协议）。

contents.text: Appendix A. Making Test Certificates
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.制作测试证书

contents.text: These scripts allow you to make certificates for test purposes. The certificates will all share a common CA root so that everyone running these scripts can have interoperable certificates. WARNING - these certificates are totally insecure and are for test purposes only. All the CAs created by this script share the same private key to facilitate interoperability testing, but this totally breaks the security since the private key of the CA is well known.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些脚本允许您制作用于测试目的的证书。这些证书都将共享一个公共CA根，这样运行这些脚本的每个人都可以拥有可互操作的证书。警告-这些证书完全不安全，仅用于测试目的。此脚本创建的所有CA共享相同的私钥，以便于进行互操作性测试，但这完全破坏了安全性，因为CA的私钥是众所周知的。

contents.text: The instructions assume a Unix-like environment with openssl installed, but openssl does work in Windows too. OpenSSL version 0.9.8j was used to generate the certificates used in this document. Make sure you have openssl installed by trying to run "openssl". Run the makeCA script found in Appendix A.1; this creates a subdirectory called demoCA. If the makeCA script cannot find where your openssl is installed you will have to set an environment variable called OPENSSLDIR to whatever directory contains the file openssl.cnf. You can find this with a "locate openssl.cnf". You are now ready to make certificates.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些说明假定安装了openssl的类似Unix的环境，但openssl也可以在Windows中工作。OpenSSL版本0.9.8j用于生成本文档中使用的证书。通过尝试运行“openssl”，确保已安装openssl。运行附录A.1中的makeCA脚本；这将创建一个名为demoCA的子目录。如果makeCA脚本无法找到openssl的安装位置，则必须将名为OPENSSLDIR的环境变量设置为包含文件openssl.cnf的任何目录。您可以通过“locate openssl.cnf”找到这一点。现在，您可以制作证书了。

contents.text: To create certificates for use with TLS, run the makeCert script found in Appendix A.2 with the fully qualified domain name of the proxy you are making the certificate for, e.g., "makeCert host.example.net domain eku". This will generate a private key and a certificate. The private key will be left in a file named domain_key_example.net.pem in Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM) format. The certificate will be in domain_cert_example.net.pem. Some programs expect both the certificate and private key combined together in a Public-Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS) #12 format file. This is created by the script and left in a file named example.net.p12. Some programs expect this file to have a .pfx extension instead of .p12 -- just rename the file if needed. A file with a certificate signing request, called example.net.csr, is also created and can be used to get the certificate signed by another CA.
contents.zh-CHS: 要创建与TLS一起使用的证书，请使用为其制作证书的代理的完全限定域名运行附录A.2中的makeCert脚本，例如“makeCert host.example.net domain eku”。这将生成私钥和证书。私钥将以隐私增强邮件（pem）格式保留在名为domain_key_example.net.pem的文件中。证书将位于域\u cert\u example.net.pem中。有些程序希望证书和私钥结合在一个公钥加密标准（PKCS）#12格式的文件中。这是由脚本创建的，并保留在名为example.net.p12的文件中。有些程序希望该文件的扩展名是.pfx而不是.p12——如果需要，只需重命名该文件即可。还将创建一个名为example.net.csr的文件，该文件带有证书签名请求，可用于获取由其他CA签名的证书。

contents.text: A second argument indicating the number of days for which the certificate should be valid can be passed to the makeCert script. It is possible to make an expired certificate using the command "makeCert host.example.net 0".
contents.zh-CHS: 第二个参数指示证书应有效的天数，可以传递给makeCert脚本。可以使用命令“makeCert host.example.net 0”生成过期证书。

contents.text: Anywhere that a password is used to protect a certificate, the password is set to the string "password".
contents.zh-CHS: 任何使用密码保护证书的地方，密码都设置为字符串“password”。

contents.text: The root certificate for the CA is in the file root_cert_fluffyCA.pem.
contents.zh-CHS: CA的根证书位于文件root\u cert\u fluffyCA.pem中。

contents.text: For things that need DER format certificates, a certificate can be converted from PEM to DER with "openssl x509 -in cert.pem -inform PEM -out cert.der -outform DER".
contents.zh-CHS: 对于需要DER格式证书的内容，可以使用“openssl x509-in cert.PEM-notify PEM-out cert.DER-outform DER”将证书从PEM转换为DER。

contents.text: Some programs expect certificates in PKCS #7 format (with a file extension of .p7c). You can convert these from PEM format to PKCS #7 with "openssl crl2pkcs7 -nocrl -certfile cert.pem -certfile demoCA/ cacert.pem -outform DER -out cert.p7c".
contents.zh-CHS: 有些程序需要PKCS#7格式的证书（文件扩展名为.p7c）。您可以使用“openssl crl2pkcs7-nocrl-certfile cert.PEM-certfile demoCA/cacert.PEM-outform DER-out cert.p7c”将这些文件从PEM格式转换为PKCS#7。

contents.text: IE (version 8), Outlook Express (version 6), and Firefox (version 3.5) can import and export .p12 files and .p7c files. You can convert a PKCS #7 certificate to PEM format with "openssl pkcs7 -in cert.p7c -inform DER -outform PEM -out cert.pem".
contents.zh-CHS: IE（版本8）、Outlook Express（版本6）和Firefox（版本3.5）可以导入和导出.p12文件和.p7c文件。您可以使用“openssl pkcs7-in cert.p7c-notify DER-outform PEM-out cert.PEM”将PKCS#7证书转换为PEM格式。

contents.text: The private key can be converted to PKCS #8 format with "openssl pkcs8 -in a_key.pem -topk8 -outform DER -out a_key.p8c".
contents.zh-CHS: 私钥可以通过“openssl pkcs8-in a_key.pem-topk8-outform DER-out a_key.p8c”转换为PKCS#8格式。

contents.text: In general, a TLS client will just need the root certificate of the CA. A TLS server will need its private key and its certificate. These could be in two PEM files, a single file with both certificate and private key PEM sections, or a single .p12 file. An S/MIME program will need its private key and certificate, the root certificate of the CA, and the certificate for every other user it communicates with.
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，TLS客户端只需要CA的根证书。TLS服务器需要其私钥和证书。这些文件可以是两个PEM文件，一个包含证书和私钥PEM部分的文件，或者一个.p12文件。S/MIME程序需要它的私钥和证书、CA的根证书以及它与之通信的每个其他用户的证书。

contents.text: A.1. makeCA script
contents.zh-CHS: A.1. makeCA脚本

contents.text:
#!/bin/sh
set -x
rm -rf demoCA
contents.zh-CHS: rm-rf demoCA

contents.text: mkdir demoCA mkdir demoCA/certs mkdir demoCA/crl mkdir demoCA/newcerts mkdir demoCA/private # This is done to generate the exact serial number used for the RFC echo "4902110184015C" > demoCA/serial touch demoCA/index.txt
contents.zh-CHS: mkdir demoCA mkdir demoCA/certs mkdir demoCA/crl mkdir demoCA/newcerts mkdir demoCA/private#这样做是为了生成RFC echo“490210184015C”>demoCA/serial touch demoCA/index.txt使用的准确序列号

contents.text:
# You may need to modify this for where your default file is
# you can find where yours in by typing "openssl ca"
for D in /etc/ssl /usr/local/ssl /sw/etc/ssl /sw/share/ssl; do
  CONF=${OPENSSLDIR:=$D}/openssl.cnf
  [ -f ${CONF} ] && break
done
CONF=${OPENSSLDIR}/openssl.cnf
if [ ! -f $CONF ]; then echo "Can not find file $CONF - set your OPENSSLDIR variable" exit fi
contents.zh-CHS: 如果[！-f$CONF]；然后echo“找不到文件$CONF-设置OPENSSLDIR变量”退出fi

contents.text: cp $CONF openssl.cnf
contents.zh-CHS: cp$CONF openssl.cnf

contents.text:
cat >> openssl.cnf  <<EOF
[ sipdomain_cert ]
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer
keyUsage = nonRepudiation,digitalSignature,keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth,1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.20

[ sipdomain_req ]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash

[ sipuser_cert ]
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer
keyUsage = nonRepudiation,digitalSignature,keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=emailProtection,1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.20

[ sipuser_req ]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash

[ sipdomain_noeku_cert ]
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer
keyUsage = nonRepudiation,digitalSignature,keyEncipherment

[ sipdomain_noeku_req ]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash

[ sipuser_noeku_cert ]
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer
keyUsage = nonRepudiation,digitalSignature,keyEncipherment

[ sipuser_noeku_req ]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
subjectAltName=\${ENV::ALTNAME}
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash
EOF

# US
# California
# San Jose

#
#

# either randomly generate a serial number, or set it manually

echo 96a384174eef8a4d > demoCA/serial

openssl crl2pkcs7 -nocrl -certfile demoCA/cacert.pem \
        -outform DER -out demoCA/cacert.p7c
cp demoCA/cacert.pem root_cert_fluffyCA.pem
contents.zh-CHS: cp demoCA/cacert.pem root\u cert\u fluffyCA.pem

contents.text: A.2. makeCert script
contents.zh-CHS: A.2. makeCert脚本

contents.text:
#!/bin/sh
set -x
# Make a symbolic link to this file called "makeUserCert" # if you wish to use it to make certs for users.
contents.zh-CHS: #如果您希望使用此文件为用户制作证书，请创建一个名为“makeUserCert”的符号链接。

contents.text:
# ExecName=$(basename $0)
#
# if [ ${ExecName} == "makeUserCert" ]; then
#   ExtPrefix="sipuser"
# elif [ ${ExecName} == "makeEkuUserCert" ]; then
#   ExtPrefix="sipuser_eku"
# elif [ ${ExecName} == "makeEkuCert" ]; then
#   ExtPrefix="sipdomain_eku"
# else
#   ExtPrefix="sipdomain"
# fi

if [ $# == 3 ]; then DAYS=36500 elif [ $# == 4 ]; then DAYS=$4 else echo "Usage: makeCert test.example.org user|domain eku|noeku [days]" echo " makeCert alice@example.org [days]" echo "days is how long the certificate is valid" echo "days set to 0 generates an invalid certificate" exit 0 fi
contents.zh-CHS: 如果[$#==3]；然后天数=36500 elif[$#==4]；then DAYS=$4 else echo“用法：makeCert test.example.org用户|域eku | noeku[DAYS]“echo”makeCertalice@example.org[days]“echo”days是证书有效的时间，“echo”days设置为0生成无效证书“退出0”

contents.text: ExtPrefix="sip"${2}

if [ $3 == "noeku" ]; then
  ExtPrefix=${ExtPrefix}"_noeku"
fi

DOMAIN=`echo $1 | perl -ne '{print "$1\n" if (/(\w+\..*)$/)}'   `
USER=`echo $1 | perl -ne '{print "$1\n" if (/(\w+)\@(\w+\..*)$/)}'   `
ADDR=$1
echo "making cert for $DOMAIN ${ADDR}"
if [ $2 == "user" ]; then CNVALUE=$USER else CNVALUE=$DOMAIN fi
contents.zh-CHS: 如果[$2==“用户”]；然后CNVALUE=$USER else CNVALUE=$DOMAIN fi

contents.text:
rm -f ${ADDR}_*.pem
rm -f ${ADDR}.p12

rm -f demoCA/index.txt
touch demoCA/index.txt
rm -f demoCA/newcerts/*
export ALTNAME
contents.zh-CHS: 导出ALTNAME

contents.text:
openssl genrsa  -out ${ADDR}_key.pem 2048
openssl req -new  -config openssl.cnf -reqexts ${ExtPrefix}_req \
        -sha1 -key ${ADDR}_key.pem \
        -out ${ADDR}.csr -days ${DAYS} <<EOF
US
California
San Jose
sipit
${CNVALUE}
contents.zh-CHS: ${CNVALUE}

contents.text: EOF
contents.zh-CHS: EOF

contents.text:
if [ $DAYS == 0 ]; then
openssl ca -extensions ${ExtPrefix}_cert -config openssl.cnf \
    -passin pass:password -policy policy_anything \
    -md sha1 -batch -notext -out ${ADDR}_cert.pem \
    -startdate 990101000000Z \
    -enddate 000101000000Z \
     -infiles ${ADDR}.csr
else
openssl ca -extensions ${ExtPrefix}_cert -config openssl.cnf \
    -passin pass:password -policy policy_anything \
    -md sha1 -days ${DAYS} -batch -notext -out ${ADDR}_cert.pem \
     -infiles ${ADDR}.csr
fi

openssl pkcs12 -passin pass:password \
    -passout pass:password -export \
    -out ${ADDR}.p12 -in ${ADDR}_cert.pem \
    -inkey ${ADDR}_key.pem -name ${ADDR} -certfile demoCA/cacert.pem
openssl x509 -in ${ADDR}_cert.pem -noout -text
Appendix B. Certificates for Testing
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.测试证书

contents.text: This section contains various certificates used for testing in PEM format.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含用于PEM格式测试的各种证书。

B.3. Certificate Chaining with a Non-Root CA
contents.zh-CHS: B.3. 具有非根CA的证书链接

contents.text: Following is a certificate for a non-root CA in example.net. The certificate was signed by the root CA shown in Section 2.1. As indicated in Sections 4.2.1.9 and 4.2.1.3 [RFC5280], "cA" is set in Basic Constraints, and "keyCertSign" is set in Key Usage. This identifies the certificate holder as a signing authority.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面是example.net中非根CA的证书。证书由根CA签署，如第2.1节所示。如第4.2.1.9节和第4.2.1.3节[RFC5280]所示，“cA”在基本约束中设置，“keyCertSign”在密钥使用中设置。这将证书持有人标识为签名机构。

contents.text: This section contains a base64-encoded, gzipped, compressed tar file of various Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) messages used in this document. Saving the data in a file foo.tgz.b64 then running a command like "openssl base64 -d -in foo.tgz.b64 | tar xfz -" would recover the CMS messages and allow them to be used as test vectors.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含本文档中使用的各种加密消息语法（CMS）消息的base64编码、gzip压缩tar文件。将数据保存在文件foo.tgz.b64中，然后运行类似于“opensslbase64-d-in foo.tgz.b64 | tar xfz-”的命令将恢复CMS消息并允许它们用作测试向量。
